name: THE AMAZING CHOICE ADVENTURE!
description:
THE AMAZING CHOICE ADVENTURE!

by Mollycule (2012)

Written by an eighth grader.

Ported to TWINE by John C. Knudsen (2020) using Twine 2.37 and Chapbook 1.0

129 Endings!

The original CYOA/Gamebook was published in PDF format, and I thought the game mechanic was interesting, so I decided to port it to TWINE to enhance playability. The present gamebook is the result. The original author (Mollycule) is aware of and has approved this port of the game...
